title: snake game
content: 设计Snake – design• Screen Layout – Border, Status, Motion Area• use a turtle object with transparent body color (blank string “”) and solid border, have itstretched to match the size of the desired dimension, or draw the borders with move()• Handling of user interaction – Mouse Click, Keyboard, Turtle Graphics• Motion Refresh – auto vs manual (sync update via timer)• Food Items – alignment of the food items with the head of the snake, plusavoiding overlapping among food items• Monster – motion towards the snake, plus its alignment with the snake• Snake – motion of the snake + body, as well as its tail extension• Detection of overlapping and direction between 2 turtle objects• Game time – tracking total game time via “time” module 思路start with demo what is the use of timer?? for arrow key-manual refresh—-when the time is up, pick the last key pressed-turn on screen refresh by calling turtle.tracer(0)if auto refresh, 会出现不能直角转方向？ move method 1–clone-4stepclone the headchange the clormovedelet the last one–问题：如果不清除之前产生的turtle对象可能会让内存爆 expensive method 2–stamp()-save imagecopy the turtle shapemove-stamp-move-stamp在每次move的地方留下stampthen turtle.clearstamps()正数清除最初的，负数清除最后的color()stamp()color()setheading()forward()see Lec.11.pdf moster use distance to detect overlap-size is 20 towards-give the angle-use angle to set heading tail extension–same as movejust not delet the last one the function left to achievemultiple monster（4）set boarderdisplay food 独立功能实现debug日志

title: 自救指南
content: 爱不适合娇惯者，爱适合战士！去战斗，去面对，去堂堂正正地审视自己和他人，去寻找爱的本质。爱自己。爱他人。不要把爱和欲望混为一谈。 RE-LABEL明确定义想法或者冲动的具体内容 RE-ATTRIBUTE将想法和感受分离，重新审视，询问为什么这种冲动如此强烈 RE-FOCUS替换活动 RE-VALUE认识癔症和幻想带来的客观伤害 RE-CREATEWhat is the life you really want?尊重自己的创造力和表达
